title: Save Up To $50 On Indiana Jones And The Great Circle Collector's Edition At Amazon
description: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle's Collector's Edition for PC (Steam) is discounted by up to $50 at Amazon. Everyone can take advantage of Amazon's deal that drops the price from $190 to $155.79. But select regions across the US, including the Midwest, can get an additional 10% off by clicking the coupon box below the price. With the coupon added, you'll see the price fall to $140.21 at checkout. Amazon's deal likely won't be available for long, and boxed copies of the game in general are becoming scarce at major retailers, as you'll see below. To be clear, the Steam version of the Collector's Edition naturally includes a code to redeem the $100 Premium Edition on PC, but you are getting several collectibles, including an oversized steelbook case. a globe with a hidden storage compartment and magnetic airplane, and an Adventure Journal of your own. Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Collector's Edition (Steam Key) $155.79 (was $190) | $140.21 if eligible for coupon. Here's what you get with Indiana Jones and the Great Circle's Collector's Edition:11-inch The Great Circle Globe with magnetic airplane and secret compartmentJumbo Steelbook Display CaseNew Adventure JournalDigital Premium Edition code on Allmaker Relic ReplicaDigital Premium Edition content: The Order of Giants Story DLC (upcoming)Temple of Doom OutfitDigital Art BookSteelbooks are pretty common these days, but Jumbo steelbook cases, well, leave it to Indy to unearth a rare find like this. And it's (the color) gold!Since the game's Premium Edition retails for $100, the physical collectibles normally cost an additional $90. With Amazon's deal, you're only paying $55.79--or $40, if eligible for the coupon--which is a pretty awesome deal. This promotion only applies to the PC edition of the game, which includes a Steam key.Walmart also has the Steam version of the Collector's Edition in stock, though it'll cost you $189.Note: The Order of Giants story expansion is still in development, but you'll have access to it when it drops. See at Amazon Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: The Collector's Edition of Indy's latest adventure comes with a globe with themed flourishes, an oversized steelbook, an Adventure Journal, and the upcoming story DLC.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle's Collector's Edition for PC (Steam) is discounted by up to $50 at Amazon. Everyone can take advantage of Amazon's deal that drops the price from $190 to $155.79. But select regions across the US, including the Midwest, can get an additional 10% off by clicking the coupon box below the price. With the coupon added, you'll see the price fall to $140.21 at checkout.

Amazon's deal likely won't be available for long, and boxed copies of the game in general are becoming scarce at major retailers, as you'll see below. To be clear, the Steam version of the Collector's Edition naturally includes a code to redeem the $100 Premium Edition on PC, but you are getting several collectibles, including an oversized steelbook case. a globe with a hidden storage compartment and magnetic airplane, and an Adventure Journal of your own.

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Collector's Edition (Steam Key)

$155.79 (was $190) | $140.21 if eligible for coupon.

Here's what you get with Indiana Jones and the Great Circle's Collector's Edition:

  • 11-inch The Great Circle Globe with magnetic airplane and secret compartment
  • Jumbo Steelbook Display Case
  • New Adventure Journal
  • Digital Premium Edition code on Allmaker Relic Replica
  • Digital Premium Edition content:
    • The Order of Giants Story DLC (upcoming)
    • Temple of Doom Outfit
    • Digital Art Book

Steelbooks are pretty common these days, but Jumbo steelbook cases, well, leave it to Indy to unearth a rare find like this. And it's (the color) gold!

Since the game's Premium Edition retails for $100, the physical collectibles normally cost an additional $90. With Amazon's deal, you're only paying $55.79--or $40, if eligible for the coupon--which is a pretty awesome deal. This promotion only applies to the PC edition of the game, which includes a Steam key.

Walmart also has the Steam version of the Collector's Edition in stock, though it'll cost you $189.

Note: The Order of Giants story expansion is still in development, but you'll have access to it when it drops.

The Xbox Series X|S Collector's Edition has been sold out at Amazon for months. Walmart has it in stock, but strangely the retailer is selling it for $240. That price isn't from a reseller, as your order would be shipped and sold by Walmart. The PS5 Collector's Edition, which released in April, is only sold by the Bethesda Gear Store for $190.

If you're interested in the physical Premium Edition for PS5 or Xbox, it's worth noting that the Xbox version is sold out at all major retailers. Amazon is also sold out of the PS5 Premium Edition, but it's in stock at Walmart. Even the standard physical edition for Xbox is sold out at major retailers. You can still get the PS5 standard edition at Amazon for $66.

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Physical Edition Availability

  • Collector's Edition (PC) at Amazon -- $155.79 ($190)
  • Collector's Edition (PC) at Walmart -- $189
  • Collector's Edition (Xbox) at Walmart -- $240 | $50 above MSRP
  • Collector's Edition (PS5) at Bethesda -- $190
  • Premium Edition (PS5) at Walmart -- $100
  • Standard Edition (PS5) at Amazon -- $66 ($70)

If you want to rewatch the Indiana Jones movies when taking breaks from the Great Circle, there are a few different box sets featuring Indy's first four adventures on Blu-ray and 4K Blu-ray.

  • Nintendo Switch 2 Restocks - Where To Buy The New Console
  • DualSense Edge PS5 Controller Drops To Best-Ever Price For Days Of Play

  • The PS5 Pro Has Received Its First Discount For Days Of Play 2025
  • The Last Of Us Season 2 Steelbook Edition 4K Blu-Ray Is Up For Preorder
  • The $325 Lord Of The Rings Deluxe Illustrated Box Set Is Only $146 For A Limited Time
  • Tolkien Collectible Book Sets Are Up For Preorder - Myths, Legends, Tales Of Middle-earth
  • Highly Limited Super Mario Bros. 30th Anniversary 4K Blu-Ray In Stock At Amazon

There are currently no available deals

GameSpot may get a commission from retail offers.
